aboutMe.bio: Enthusiastic and detail-oriented PHP, java Developer with 2 years of experience in designing and developing dynamic, scalable, and secure web applications. Proficient in PHP, java ,Laravel, MySQL, JavaScript, and RESTful APIs, with expertise in backend development, database management, and API integration. Adept at improving website performance, implementing security best practices, and optimizing databases. Passionate about delivering efficient and user-friendly web solutions.

education.institution: EBET College of Engineering (Erode Builders Educational Trust)

projects.title: Sommelier
projects.description: A restaurant food ordering and table booking application designed to provide a seamless user experience. Built using React Native for the mobile frontend and Laravel for the backend, the application allows users to browse menus, place food orders, and reserve tables effortlessly. It integrates with secure payment gateways to ensure safe transactions and uses Laravel to manage orders, bookings, and user authentication. The system delivers a smooth, efficient, and user-friendly experience tailored specifically for restaurant operations.

projects.title: Researchcollab.ai
projects.description: An interactive online platform designed for research collaboration and knowledge sharing. Built using WordPress with Elementor and Beaver Builder for frontend customization, and powered by PHP and MySQL for backend operations, the platform enables researchers to publish, share, and collaborate on research papers efficiently. It integrates dynamic content management, real-time search, and role-based access control to provide a streamlined experience for contributors.

projects.title: My PortFolio
projects.description: web application designed to professionally showcase my personal information, technical skills, projects, resume, and contact details. The front end is built with React.js, featuring a responsive and user-friendly UI with smooth animations powered by Framer Motion and interactive elements like snowfall effects. It includes dedicated sections such as 'About Me', 'Skills', 'Resume', 'Projects', and 'Contact', providing a structured and visually appealing presentation of my work and experience. An admin dashboard is included, secured with a static login system, allowing content to be dynamically managed through a sidebar-based form editor. The dashboard supports real-time CRUD operations for each section, enabling efficient updates without navigating away from the interface. Data is fetched and managed via service files for clean architecture, and the backend is powered by Laravel APIs, ensuring seamless and secure data handling. Overall, the project emphasizes clarity, maintainability, and interactivity, reflecting both front-end finesse and back-end integration in a personal branding tool.

aboutMe.heading: Contact Us
aboutMe.description: Have a project in mind or need help building a complete web solution? Whether it's front-end, back-end, or full stack development, I'm here to help turn your ideas into reality. Get in touch for website development, application design, API integration, or technical consultation. Let's build something great together!
